system_prompt: You are a precise research analyst. Respond with strictly valid JSON matching the provided schema. Do not include explanations or markdown.
user_prompt:
Validate and enrich the museum record using only the evidence provided.

YOUR FOCUS: Extract ONLY fields where you have clear evidence. Skip fields with no evidence.

FIELDS TO EXTRACT (only if evidence exists):
1. IDENTITY & LOCATION:
   - museum_name: Official name from website/Wikipedia
   - city: City name
   - street_address: Full street address
   - postal_code: ZIP/postal code
   - website: Validated URL
   - latitude, longitude: Coordinates

2. CLASSIFICATION:
   - primary_domain: Art|History|Science|Culture|Specialty|Mixed
   - museum_type: Specific category
   - audience_focus: Target audience

3. QUALITY INDICATORS:
   - city_tier: 1-5 (1=major metro, 5=small town)
   - reputation: 1-5 (1=world-renowned, 5=local)
   - collection_tier: 1-5 (1=world-class, 5=modest)
   - time_needed: '1-2 hours'|'Half day'|'Full day'|'Multiple days'

4. SUMMARY:
   - notes: 2-3 sentence summary if you have collection/context info

CRITICAL FORMATTING RULES:
✓ CORRECT - Field with evidence:
  "museum_name": {
    "value": "Denver Art Museum",
    "source": "official_website",
    "trust_level": 5,
    "confidence": 5
  }

✓ CORRECT - Field with no evidence:
  "museum_name": null

✗ WRONG - Never do this:
  "museum_name": {"value": null}  ❌ INVALID
  "museum_name": {"value": "Not provided"}  ❌ INVALID

If you don't have evidence for a field, set it to null (not an object).
Only create EnrichedField objects when you have actual data.

Trust levels: OFFICIAL_EXTRACT (5), WIKIPEDIA (3), LLM_EXTRACTED (2)
Confidence: 1-5 (how certain are you about this value)

REQUIRED TOP-LEVEL FIELDS:
  "confidence": 1-5 (overall confidence in this analysis)
  "model_used": "gpt-4o-mini"
  "needs_deep_dive": true|false (if scoring/deeper analysis needed)

Evidence Packet:
{
  "identity": {
    "museum_id": "usa-co-unknown-denver-firefighters-museum",
    "museum_name": "Denver Firefighters Museum",
    "city": "Colorado",
    "state_province": "Colorado",
    "country": "USA",
    "website": "https://denverfirefightersmuseum.org",
    "primary_domain": null
  },
  "state_record_subset": {
    "museum_type": "GENERAL MUSEUM",
    "audience_focus": null,
    "city_tier": 3,
    "reputation": null,
    "collection_tier": null,
    "time_needed": "Half day",
    "notes": "CSV: phone from IRS 990 database CSV: museum type 'GENERAL MUSEUM' CSV: coordinates from IRS 990 database"
  },
  "wikidata_claims": {},
  "wikipedia_summary": null,
  "website_json_ld": {},
  "website_text_snippet": "[ Support the Museum by Donating Today! ](/donate)\n[ ](https://denverfirefightersmuseum.org/online-store?olsPage=cart)\n * [Sign In](/m/account)\n * * * *\n * [My Account](/m/account)\n * Signed in as:\n * filler@godaddy.com\n * * * *\n * [My Account](/m/account)\n * Sign out\n * [Home](/)\n * [Online Store](/online-store)\n * [Plan Your Visit ](/plan-your-visit)\n * [About The Museum](/about-the-museum-1)\n * [Become a Member](/become-a-member)\n * [For Adults!](/for-adults)\n * [For kids!](/for-kids-1)\n * [Learn with Us! ](/learn-with-us)\n * [Ebay Store](https://www.ebay.com/usr/firefightersmuseum?_pgn=2)\n * [Donate](/donate)\n * [Exhibits](/exhibits)\n * [Host an Event ](/host-an-event)\n * [Blog](/blog)\n * [Contact Us](/contact-us)\n * [Volunteer with DFM](/volunteer-with-dfm-1)\n * [Upcoming Events](/upcoming-events)\n * [My Account](/m/account)\n * Sign out\n * [Sign In](/m/account)\n * [My Account](/m/account)\n# DENVER FIREFIGHTERS MUSEUM \nDENVER FIREFIGHTERS MUSEUM DENVER FIREFIGHTERS MUSEUM DENVER FIREFIGHTERS MUSEUM \n**(303) 892-1436**\n[Become a Member](/become-a-member#0a3847c9-1dae-434f-bb20-3e8fc29fb441)\n#### Remember the Embers\n#### Squirt's Fire Safety Class\n#### Fun at the Firehouse\nJoi...",
  "subpages_scraped": [],
  "packet_metadata": {
    "approx_tokens": 498,
    "max_chars": 8000
  }
}

Return JSON with properly formatted EnrichedField objects (or null if no evidence).
